events.name: HackerspaceSG's Xmas Party!
events.description:
We can't not have a Christmas party. 

So here's the deal â€” we're having an open house. BYO food, BYO drinks/booze. 

Some of us might be pooling money together to buy the usual Christmassy meat, ham and wine. If you're feeling lazy, just chip in around $30 to the pot, and we'll settle the noms. (And don't worry too much about it!)

From what we've seen, the tech community has the amazing ability to conjure fun out of just being together. We'll have the nerf guns, drones and [insert flavour-of-the-month game here ðŸ˜‰] as catalysts!

Come one, come all. Let's have a great festive celebration together! â›„

(Santa may or may not show up this year. You'll have to believe to find out!)
events.location: HackerspaceSG, 344B King George's Avenue, King George's Building, Singapore 208576
